name: Astroid Feild
description:
Two Space ships are trying to get to their home planet but they get caught in a seemingly endless asteroid field AND enemy spaceships come.

This was made for the Brackeys GameJam2010.1, when the two players bubbles are colliding they get a strength boost, the Spaceships were these https://guardian5.itch.io/blue-green-and-red-spacecraft-asset, and the font is this https://jotson.itch.io/gravity-pixel-font.
